title: Promotion Series Bug (Possibly? Need help)
body: I am currently bronze 1 and won 3 of my 5 games to be promoted to silver 5. On my last win it again said i quialified to be promoted by winning 3 of 5 games.... Why do I have to do it again?

replies.body: It sounds strange that you would be asked to do another series, so I looked into this for you.  It looks like you had two losses already, and unfortunately had a queue dodge as well.  That counted as a third loss and ended the series.  Luckily, I see that you are in a new series now.  Best of luck to you!
any ideas at all? seems like there is no one that knows.
